website_summaries.verdict: This jackhammer and pavement breaker has the power of higher end models, but the user comfort of a consumer grade rental. Ideal for commercial demolition work where a larger jackhammer would be impractical to use.
pros: Suspended handles absorb shock, reduces user fatigue
Soft start reduces chance of tripping breakers
Heavy-duty results from a midrange model
cons: Hand truck is weak, can break unexpectedly
Light gauge steel and some reports of bad welds

customer_reviews.title: DOLLY is too weak! (Warranty Works)
customer_reviews.text: It is quite powerful but the dolly is weak. I paid good $1500 for this product at-least they should have made the dolly sturdier. Edit -- After 8 months the product broke down. Called DEWALT and they sent me to an authorized repair shop in MD. Few days later brought the machine home and started but it started smoking so took it right back to the repair shop. They sent it back to DEWALT and DEWALT sent me back a BRAND NEW HAMMER. I am happy with the 1 year warranty!!!
customer_reviews.author: M I.

customer_reviews.title: Preferred brand
customer_reviews.text: Great buy, and so affordable. We have used this many times on different jobs and it works great. I haven't used my warranty yet, so no reviews for that as of now.
customer_reviews.author: Buckwheat91

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Glad I didn't go with a 40 pound hammer. This thing breaks concrete. Not even a half hour to break that all out. I almost bought the bosch turbo but all of my tools are milwaukee and dewalt.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: Awesome jack hammer. We use them for trenching in the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Cj

customer_reviews.title: Seems good so far.
customer_reviews.text: Seems very good so far, will be doing some work in the next 30 days so I can make a more thorough review.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Heavy hitter! Great machine! Only con is the free hand truck is a bit weak but hey, it works! Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Harper

customer_reviews.title: Real Power
customer_reviews.text: Have used this myself. Like a hot knife through butter. Purchased for my dad. I hear nothing but good things. Would recommend this Dewalt product anytime.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Works very well!
customer_reviews.text: I used mine on several projects to break up concrete and have not tripped any breakers! I know its possible, and am not really worried, I think the soft start helps a lot. I've also used it on asphalt, no sweat. Great also is the tamping shank with the six inch square tamping plate for compacting grade. I"ll edit this review after i've used it to pile drive some grounding rods. There are a lot of accessories to increase the usefulness of this tool.
customer_reviews.author: bentlevel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this jackhammer is awesome. the shock absorbing handles are so much of a relief. buy it...meow.
customer_reviews.author: jason kopec

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product was as advertised and funtioned well. Hard to find product, but this company had it and in stock.
customer_reviews.author: Fishman

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool
customer_reviews.text: Have used this on and off for about a year. A lot of rock where I am and the ground is very hard. This hammer is heavy duty, and works well, reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Curmudgeon

customer_reviews.title: buster
customer_reviews.text: Ive had it for 3 years and still will bust 8 inch concrete. as good as hilti. buy it you wont be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: robert staack

customer_reviews.title: Short enjoyment
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived well but a little late. I needed it urgently on site. Unfortunately, I did not get to use it much because it was stolen from the job site.
customer_reviews.author: Kioumars Ghobad

customer_reviews.title: Great product, I bought it to dig wells in ...
customer_reviews.text: The tool is great but the service support in Nicaragua is not as good, I was told by the authorized repair shop that I needed to stop using generators because it was burning the internal circuits. Great product, I bought it to dig wells in Nicaragua and it has been great with the exception of bits that are not genuine DEWALT and there for of poor quality. The issue is that the doesn't came with the wrench to tight the screws that get loose with the vibration and is not a common tool
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Power?  Oh yea.
customer_reviews.text: It's heavy but works exceptionally well. I have never used an electric break hammer with this much power. The cart is not the best quality but it serves it's purpose. I've used the hilti, bosch brute, and the big makita. If you're measuring for power, this beats them all. It will wear you out if you don't use it properly.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Vito Fiore

product_meta.title: DEWALT Demolition Hammer, Pavement Breaker with Hammer Truck (D25980KB)
product_meta.description: Size:One BoxThe DEWALT D25980KB Heavy Duty Pavement Breaker with Hammer Truck and Steel features 61 Ft-lbs. impact energy that provides for maximum performance in general concrete demolition, sidewalk & road demolition, ground-rod driving and basement waterproofing. This tool has the DEWALT SHOCKS - Active Vibration Control system that reduces vibration by up to 70% which makes the unit more comfortable to operate. A powerful 15 Amp motor provides maximum overload protection & power for longer tool life. The D25980KB has rubber coated handles that provide greater comfort and control for you. The unit also has an electronic soft start which increases productivity by reducing bit walking. The D25980KB includes the D259803 hand truck and steel, which is designed to transport the DEWALT D25980 breaker with the steel in or out of tool eliminating need to remove bit during transport. The D259803 has an integral hold-down strap that keeps the strap permanently mounted to hammer truck, reducing the chances of losing them. The cart comes with an integral cord-wrap which allows for easy cord storage. The secured bit storage firmly holds up to (4) 1-1/8" breaker steel bits. This kit includes the D25980 Pavement Breaker and D259803 Hammer truck & Steel, which comes with: 1- Bull point chisels, 1 - 1" Flat chisel, 1- 3" Flat chisel, Flat Foot Plate for Hammer Truck, Pegged foot plate for hammer truck. Designed for general concrete, sidewalk and road demolition, ground-rod driving and basement waterproofing.
feature_bullets: SHOCKS - Active Vibration Control Reduces vibration felt by the user at the handles
61 Ft-lbs. impact energy provides maximum performance
15 amp motor provides maximum power and overload protection
Electronic soft start increases productivity by reducing bit walking
Same product as D25980K, but product ships in single box

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars25 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
